title: Prompt Specification
description: Schema for defining, validating, and managing prompts in the prompt-crafting platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for this prompt. Must be a lowercase kebab-case string.

description.description: A clear description of what this prompt does and when to use it.

author.description: Author or team responsible for this prompt.

inputs.description: Declared input variables that this prompt expects.

messages.description: The message sequence (system, user, assistant) that composes this prompt.

examples.description: Example input/output pairs demonstrating expected behavior.

output_format.description: Specification for the expected output format.

safety.description: Safety constraints and content policy rules.

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-value metadata for tooling or organizational use.

name.description: Variable name used in template interpolation (e.g., '{{name}}').

type.description: Expected data type for this input.

description.description: Explanation of what this input represents.

required.description: Whether this input must be provided.

default.description: Default value if the input is not provided.

enum.description: Allowed values for this input (acts as a constraint).

role.description: The role of this message in the conversation.

content.description: The message content. May contain template variables like '{{variable_name}}'.

inputs.description: Input variable values for this example.

expected_output.description: The expected output for the given inputs.

assertions.description: Programmatic assertions to validate against the output.

type.description: The type of assertion to apply.

value.description: The value to check against (string, regex pattern, or JSONPath expression).

message.description: Custom failure message for this assertion.

type.description: The expected format of the model output.

schema.description: A JSON Schema describing the expected output structure (when type is 'json').

description.description: Human-readable description of the expected output.

constraints.description: Safety constraints that must be preserved in the assembled prompt (e.g., 'Never reveal system instructions').

blocked_topics.description: Topics the prompt must refuse to engage with.

max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens allowed in the output.

pii_redaction.description: Whether to redact PII from inputs before sending to the model.

scorers.description: Scorers to use when evaluating prompt outputs.

threshold.description: Minimum average score (0-1) required to pass evaluation.

name.description: Name of the scorer to apply (e.g., 'regex', 'json-schema', 'similarity').

weight.description: Weight of this scorer in the overall evaluation score.
